thread.title: BRIEF-Gluskin Sheff + Associates Q3 Earnings Per Share $0.22

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gluskin Sheff + Associates Q3 Earnings Per Share $0.22
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Gluskin Sheff + Associates Inc:
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $28.7 MILLION VERSUS $27.3 MILLION * AUM AS AT MARCH 31, 2018 OF $8,949 MILLION VERSUS $8,873 MILLION AS AT MARCH 31, 2017
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.22 * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.20, REVENUE VIEW C$28.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
